revised_title: Ancient Sinhalese Iron and Steel: A Metallurgical Analysis
tldr: The author examines ancient Sinhalese iron and steel artifacts from Ceylon, dating back to the 5th century BC, and provides a detailed analysis of their composition, structure, and hardness. The research reveals that the ancient Sinhalese had knowledge of cementation, suggesting that the art of metallurgy was more advanced in the past than previously thought.
